metadata.title: CVE-2019-14540 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A Polymorphic Typing issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databindbefore 2.9.10. It is related to com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariConfig.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14540` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.10.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10.0-2').
